daily_insights.title: Sleep Quality Improving
daily_insights.snippet: Your sleep duration has increased by 12% this week. Your average sleep quality score is 8.2/10, which is excellent.

recommendation.why: Consistent sleep patterns improve recovery and cognitive function
recommendation.next_steps: Continue your current sleep routine. Consider going to bed 15 minutes earlier to reach your 8-hour goal.

daily_insights.title: Activity Level Optimal
daily_insights.snippet: You've maintained an average of 8,500 steps per day this week. Your activity level is in the optimal range for cardiovascular health.

recommendation.why: Regular physical activity reduces risk of chronic disease
recommendation.next_steps: Maintain your current activity level. Consider adding 2-3 strength training sessions per week.

daily_insights.title: Your Mood & Sleep Connection
daily_insights.snippet: VitalsLink detected that on days you **journaled a 'Great' mood**, your **average HRV increased by 5ms** that night. Keep it up!

recommendation.why: Your positive mental state appears to be directly improving your physical recovery during sleep.
recommendation.next_steps: Continue journaling positive experiences. Consider a gratitude practice before bed to enhance this connection.
